meanings.sent1: The superheroines saved the city from the villain.
meanings.sent2: Many children look up to superheroines as role models.
meanings.sent3: The superheroines decided to have a picnic in their capes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, the superheroines shine brightly.
meanings.sent5: The brave superheroines flew through the sky to rescue the cat stuck on the roof.

meanings.definition: Women with extraordinary powers who fight evil
meanings.sent1: Superheroines use their powers to protect the innocent.
meanings.sent2: The superheroines joined forces to defeat the supervillain.
meanings.sent3: The superheroines had a friendly competition to see who could fly the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The superheroines' courage in the face of danger is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The superheroines' teamwork and bravery knew no bounds as they battled the forces of darkness.

meanings.definition: Female characters in comic books with superhuman abilities
meanings.sent1: My favorite comic features a group of powerful superheroines.
meanings.sent2: The superheroines' adventures in the comic book are always exciting.
meanings.sent3: The superheroines in the comic book decided to start a band in their free time.
meanings.sent4: The superheroines' strength and resilience leap off the pages of the comic.
meanings.sent5: The colorful illustrations bring the superheroines to life in the comic book world.
